name: NU_TyphoidFeverTestsForSalmonellaTyphiOrSalmonellaParatyphiNucleicAcid
title: NU_Typhoid Fever (Tests for Salmonella typhi or Salmonella paratyphi Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Salmonella typhi or Salmonella paratyphi nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Salmonella typhi nucleic acid;  

LOINC search:  'salmonella (typhi or paratyphi) nucleic acid'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Salmonella typhi DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection

contains.display: Salmonella typhi DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
